parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To cover, conceal, ward off, bear with, endure patiently. From stege; to roof over, i.e. to cover with silence.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hope, hope for, expect, trust. From elpis; to expect or confide.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From hupo and meno; to stay under, i.e. Remain; figuratively, to undergo, i.e. Bear, have fortitude, persevere.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
